name: MEC Wanderwall Shorts - Women's
description:
Durable, stretchy and breathable, these shorts set the bar for comfort on the trail or in the canoe. With classic styling and a mid-rise waist, they look as good with a tank top and flip flops as they do with a PFD or hydration pack.Made of ripstop nylon and spandex, with recycled content. Durable water repellent (DWR) ensures they dry quickly.Pull-on, drawcord-style elastic waist with faux fly.2 deep front pockets have mesh pocket bags for breathability.Gusseted crotch gives you range of motion to reach for footholds, sink deep into yoga poses or bound over fallen logs.

Regular fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering




        Sustainability
